actionCalls.name: myRule_22_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Email Notes to BPREP PWM

actionCalls.name: myRule_24_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Meeting notes to BCP V PWM

actionCalls.name: myRule_26_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Email Notes to BSIP PWM

actionCalls.name: myRule_28_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Email alert to PWM PMT

actionCalls.name: myRule_30_A1
actionCalls.label: Send Meeting Notes to PFG PWM BOZ

rules.name: myRule_22
rules.label: Has BPREP Desc Been Updated for PW?

rules.name: myRule_24
rules.label: Has BCP V Desc been updated for PW?

rules.name: myRule_26
rules.label: Has BSIP Desc been updated for PW?

rules.name: myRule_28
rules.label: Has BIF IV Desc been Updated for PW?

rules.name: myRule_30
rules.label: Has BOZ Desc been updated for PWM?

rules.name: myRule_9
rules.conditionLogic: (1 or 2) and (3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7 or 8 or 9 or 10)
rules.label: Update Brookfield Activity for Event

Flow.description: Send Meeting Notes to PWM PMT when Notes are updated for certain Investor Types.

value.stringValue: AND (NOT(ISBLANK( [Event].Opportunity__c )), (ISCHANGED([Event].Description) || ISNEW()), [Event].EndDateTime < Now(), [Event].Opportunity__c.Investment_Vehicle__c.Name = "BPREP", OR( ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_22
formulas.expression: AND (NOT(ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__c} )), (ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Description}) || ISNEW()), {!myVariable_current.EndDateTime} < Now(), {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Investment_Vehicle__r.Name} = "BPREP", OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )

value.stringValue: AND (NOT(ISBLANK( [Event].Opportunity__c )), (ISCHANGED([Event].Description) || ISNEW()), [Event].EndDateTime < Now(), [Event].Opportunity__c.Investment_Vehicle__c.Name = "BCP V", OR( ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_24
formulas.expression: AND (NOT(ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__c} )), (ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Description}) || ISNEW()), {!myVariable_current.EndDateTime} < Now(), {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Investment_Vehicle__r.Name} = "BCP V", OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )

value.stringValue: AND (NOT(ISBLANK( [Event].Opportunity__c )), (ISCHANGED([Event].Description) || ISNEW()), [Event].EndDateTime < Now(), [Event].Opportunity__c.Investment_Vehicle__c.Name = "BSIP", OR( ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_26
formulas.expression: AND (NOT(ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__c} )), (ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Description}) || ISNEW()), {!myVariable_current.EndDateTime} < Now(), {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Investment_Vehicle__r.Name} = "BSIP", OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )

value.stringValue: AND (NOT(ISBLANK( [Event].Opportunity__c )), (ISCHANGED([Event].Description) || ISNEW()), [Event].EndDateTime < Now(), [Event].Opportunity__c.Investment_Vehicle__c.Name = "BIF IV", OR( ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL([Event].Opportunity__c.Account.Investor_Type__c , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_28
formulas.expression: AND (NOT(ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__c} )), (ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Description}) || ISNEW()), {!myVariable_current.EndDateTime} < Now(), {!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Investment_Vehicle__r.Name} = "BIF IV", OR( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Multi Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "UHNW"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Single Family Office"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "Private Bank / Wirehouse"), ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Opportunity__r.Account.Investor_Type__c} , "RIA / Wealth Manager") ) )

Flow.label: PFG PMT Meeting Notes for PWM only
